biography: Alan Gordon Partridge is a fictional character portrayed by English comedian Steve Coogan. Two radio, three television and one Youtube series – as well as several TV and radio specials, plus appearances on BBC's Comic Relief – have tracked this spoof television and radio presenter through his career. Alan has recently released his ("very thorough") autobiography, "I, Partridge: We Need to Talk about Alan"; available in hardback, paperback and unabridged audiobook, read by the man himself. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Alan Partridge
